app.name: Nue Flirt
app.tagline: Find your spark with AI-powered dating.

home.heroSubtitle: Welcome to Nue Flirt, the dating app that transforms your profile with captivating AI-generated videos. Experience a new, interactive way to meet people across India.
home.newEraSubtitle: Go beyond static photos. Nue Flirt offers a dynamic and playful experience designed for modern Indian dating.
home.featureVideosDesc: Create unique, stunning profile videos that capture your essence. Our AI brings your photos to life.
home.featureRevealsDesc: Break the ice with interactive video reveals, available for mutual matches. A fun, consensual way to connect.
home.featureSwipeDesc: Discover profiles with dynamic video teasers. Our smart filters help you find the right match in India.

validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.validDob: Please enter a valid date in DD/MM/YYYY format.
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters.
validation.age18: You must be at least 18 years old.

dashboard.filterSubtitle: Find matches based on your preferences.
dashboard.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters or come back later for new profiles.
dashboard.matchDescription: You and {name} have liked each other.
dashboard.premiumRewindDesc: Upgrade to Premium to use Rewind.
dashboard.likeErrorDesc: Could not process your like. Please try again.
dashboard.likeLimitDesc: You've used all your free likes for today. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited likes.
dashboard.superLikeLimitDesc: One free Super Like per day. Get more with Premium.
dashboard.roseNeedsCredits: Roses cost 1 credit. Get credits via Premium or purchases.

profile.manageProfile: Manage your account details and preferences.
profile.increaseVisibility: Increase your visibility by building trust.
profile.trustScoreHint: A higher trust score improves your match potential. Complete your profile and get verified.
profile.promptsDesc: Answer up to 3 prompts to show more of your personality.
profile.preferencesDesc: Help us find better matches for you.
profile.interestsDesc: Select your interests and lifestyle preferences to find better matches.
profile.creditsDesc: You need to be a premium member or have credits to boost your profile.
profile.boostDesc: Your profile will be shown to more people for the next 30 minutes.

chat.safetyWarning: Some messages in this chat may contain concerning content.
chat.offlineMessage: You're offline. Messages will send when connected.
chat.callStub: Full call requires WebRTC setup. Use your phone for now.
chat.virtualDateWaiting: Virtual date proposed — waiting for response
chat.noMatchesForGroup: Match with people first to create a group.

safety.title: Safety Center
safety.subtitle: Report, block, and stay safe.
safety.userBlockedDesc: They will no longer see your profile or be able to message you.
safety.blockConfirmDesc: They won't see your profile in discovery or be able to message you. You can unblock from Safety Center.
safety.tip1: Never share financial details or send money to someone you haven't met.
safety.tip2: Meet in public and tell a friend where you're going.
safety.tip3: Report and block anyone who makes you uncomfortable.
safety.tip4: Verify your profile to build trust; ask matches to do the same.
safety.idVerificationDesc: Verify your identity for a verified badge. Go to Profile → Verification.
safety.panicDesc: Share your current location with our safety team. Use only in an emergency.
safety.panicSentDesc: Your location has been recorded for the safety team.
safety.panicErrorDesc: Allow location access in browser settings and try again.

events.title: In-app Events
events.subtitle: Meet ups and activities.
events.noEvents: No events yet. Check back later!
